reviewText: I bought this because it was the only place I could find Runaway Train on DVD. It's a strange pairing, a silly Chuck Norris film and an award-winning, philosophical runaway train movie that Akira Kurosawa was involved in. Definitely worth getting for Runaway Train. If you like RT and Chuck Norris, I suppose this is your lucky day.

This is a good movie for action fans, drama fans, fans of prison movies, etc.  However, I purchased the movie for the train scenes; being associated with railroads for over 50 years.  As a "spoiler":  Check out one of the boxers in the prison scenes -- Yes, it's none other than Danny Trejo in his first movie!
